verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
My eyes are fixed on You
O Lord, Your loving face I seek
I set my heart hard after You
I'll follow faithfully

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Each weight I lay aside
By grace I will abide
Your rod and staff
They comfort me
And open up my eyes
You've opened up my eyes

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
To see Your holiness
To be Your righteousness
O how I need You Lord
To see Your majesty
To be Your family
O Lord I praise Your name
